meanings.definition: Software designed for collaborative work within a group.
meanings.sent1: Our company uses groupwares to work together on projects efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Groupwares help teams to collaborate and achieve common goals.
meanings.sent3: The groupwares decided to throw a virtual party to celebrate their successful project completion.
meanings.sent4: The groupwares acted as a conductor, harmonizing the efforts of team members.
meanings.sent5: Using groupwares feels like having a digital meeting room where everyone can contribute.

meanings.definition: The use of software to facilitate communication and coordination among members of a group.
meanings.sent1: With groupwares, our team can easily share updates and stay connected.
meanings.sent2: Effective groupwares ensure smooth communication within organizations.
meanings.sent3: The groupwares chatted animatedly, making the virtual meeting lively and engaging.
meanings.sent4: Groupwares are like the invisible threads that weave team members together.
meanings.sent5: Using groupwares is like having a digital bulletin board where everyone can post messages.
